gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 129, Wizards 127
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Wizards, 129-127. Adama Sanogo recorded a career-high 22 points and 20 rebounds for the Bulls, with Javonte Green (24 points, seven rebounds) and Jevon Carter (season-high 20 points, season-high 12 assists) combined for 44 points in the victory. Deni Avdija tallied 23 points, 12 rebounds, and eight assists for the Wizards in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 39-42, while the Wizards fall to 15-66.
